Directives > ui-carousel

Horizontal carousel

previous next

Current Item: {{oCarouselCurrentItem.name}}


<ui-carousel horizontal data-items="aCarouselItems" data-current-item="oCarouselCurrentItem" />
</ui-carousel>

Events listner and emitter within the controller


$scope.$on("updateScreen", function(oEvent, oItem) {
  $scope.oCarouselCurrentItem = oItem;
});
$scope.$broadcast("updateCarouselScroll", $scope.oCarouselCurrentItem);

ui-carousel Events

Name type description
updateScreen Emitted This event is fired if there is a click on one of the element showed in the carousel bar.
updateCarouselScroll Listened This event is listened by the directive, if the user wants to update the position of the scroll's carousel bar he should fire this event.

ui-carousel Options

Name type description
items Array The array that contains the element that will be showed in the carousel container
currentItems object The current item showed on the screen
